title: 'Rak' is censored on the Client?
body: Is Rak a word word worth censoring? Like I'm trying to name some rune and mastery pages for Soraka and I'm getting So***a ?

replies.body: As it turns out, when we updated some of the language filters something went a little wrong and those filters are bleeding over into rune pages and such. Sounds like it's being a little overzealous as well xD. We're still working on figuring out what happened, but for now, you might be able to get it to stop filtering rune page names by turning off the filter if you prefer.
Disable swear word filtering in settings and you should be fine.
